Haste
[i]Coin Flip[/i] – Whenever Joshua, Jehanna's Luck enters or attacks, flip a coin. If you win the flip, create a Treasure token.
[i]Killing Edge[/i] – Whenever Joshua deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card or copy a [i]Crit[/i] ability of another creature you control.
